roleset.name: to cast down in spirit
roleset.note: DEJECT-V NOTES: Frames file for 'deject' based on internet usage examples, membership in VN. VerbNet class 31.1, comparison with 'dishearten.' (from deject.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: passive
example.text: [The poor fellow]-1 was dejected from lack of food and water.
example.arg: from lack of food and water
